innhold.avsnitt: You can log in to your personal parental benefit webpage Dine foreldrepenger and see the status of your case. Here you can also modify your application, upload any outstanding documents, and see an overview of your case.
If you have applied using a printed form, you will be able to see the status of your case here after about ten days. See what the processing time is in your county
Once your application has been fully processed

If you have been granted parental benefit, you will find a simple overview of your plan for the parental benefit period, with information about all your periods of parental benefit and any remaining days. NB: This only applies to cases where the mother started her parental benefit period on or after 1 January 2019.

On your personal parental benefit page Dine foreldrepenger, you can apply for changes, upload any outstanding attachments to your application, see your case documents, and see information about your case.

Parental benefit is paid by the 25th of the month. You can log in and see all the payments you have received in the last three years. If you receive your parental benefit from your employer, contact your employer about payment dates and for an overview of payments.
